product_name: White Sierra Discover Dailey Dress - Special Buy
long_description: Stretchy and wrinkle-resistant, the White Sierra Discover Dailey Dress frees you up for everyday adventures at home and for travels abroad. Knit blends 95% bamboo rayon with 5% spandex for stretch. Fabric drapes nicely and feels soft to the touch; wicks moisture to keep you dry and comfy. Crossover V-neck styling; small geo print and larger paisley print. White Sierra Discover Dailey Dress has a 35 in. length. Special buy.
short_description: Stretchy and wrinkle-resistant, the White Sierra Discover Dailey Dress frees you up for everyday adventures at home and for travels abroad.
